fields.name: Sysctl parameter tuning
fields.description: Avoid issues with system memory, kernel panics, and improve performance of DBs by modifying kernel parameters using sysctl.

fields.name: Update kernel boot options
fields.description: Stay on top of system boot failures, kernel panics, kdump failures and other issues by updating your kernel boot options.

fields.name: Update Package
fields.description: Prevent drops in network performance and network connectivity losses by updating the NetworkManager package.

fields.name: Update httpd service configuration
fields.description: Improve security posture and prevent availability issues by updating the service configuration of httpd.

fields.name: Upgrade kernel
fields.description: Upgrade your kernel to avoid problems with boot failures, kernel panic situations, or system performance degradations.

fields.name: Upgrade edge image kernel
fields.description: Reduce the risk of kernel panic or performance degradation by upgrading the kernel version in your edge images.
